title: Content Writer – Blogs, GBP Posts & Backlink Content
job_overview:
Overview
We’re looking for a focused and reliable content writer to handle our ongoing blog posts, Google Business Profile (GBP) content, and backlink articles. This role is ideal for someone with excellent research and writing skills who can write clearly and quickly for the ABA therapy and healthcare industries.

Responsibilities
Write weekly blog posts for multiple ABA therapy and healthcare clients
Develop GBP content that’s geo-targeted and localized
Draft high-quality content for backlinking and guest post purposes
Repurpose and edit AI-generated drafts for clarity, tone, and engagement
Follow and refine internal workflows to keep pace with publishing needs
Communicate regularly with the SEO team for topic coordination
Deliver clean, proofread, plagiarism-free copy on time


What We’re Looking For
Proven writing experience (healthcare, ABA, or educational topics a plus)
Familiarity with basic SEO concepts (H1s, keyword use, internal linking)
Ability to work fast without sacrificing quality
Comfortable editing or enhancing AI-generated content
Strong communication and accountability in a remote setting
Willingness to learn our style guide and stick to it

Tools & Workflow
We use Google Docs, Upgrade to see actual info, Slack, and Loom for most team communications and task tracking
You’ll receive assignments via Upgrade to see actual info, with clear deadlines and word count expectations
AI support (e.g., ChatGPT) may be provided to help with drafts, but all content must be polished, original, and aligned with our tone
You’ll be trained on our internal SOPs, including formatting, keyword integration, linking strategies, and publishing steps
All content must be submitted through our internal QA checklist before review.

Success in This Role Looks Like
You consistently hit weekly writing targets (3–5 pieces, depending on type and length)
You maintain a low revision rate by following briefs closely and self-editing thoroughly
You’re responsive during PH working hours and communicate clearly if you’re stuck or need help
You demonstrate improvement over time in writing speed, accuracy, and strategic keyword use
You accept feedback well and apply it to future drafts without repeating the same issues

Along with your resume, please submit a 200-word original writing sample on the topic: “What Is ABA Therapy?”
Your sample should include relevant facts and statistics, and it must be written manually—do not use AI tools to generate the content.

We’re looking for clear, informative writing that reflects your understanding of the topic and your ability to communicate it effectively.
